mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT 1)) AS ROWNUM, A.DATASEQ, A.WORKDAILY_SEQ, B.RULESYSID, B.FACTORYID, B.LINEID, B.SHIFTID, B.WORK_DATE, A.PERSONID, A.OVERTIME, A.NOTES, A.CREATOR, A.CREATETIME, A.EVENT, A.EVENTUSER, A.EVENTTIME, A.ISUSABLE, B.TID FROM DSP_WORKER_INPUT A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE 1=1 AND WORKDAILY_SEQ = #{workdailySeq}
